description: This file defines a Flutter widget for creating and editing financial transactions, including form handling, navigation, and interaction with providers for authentication and transaction management.

classes.name: TransactionCrudScreen
classes.description: A Flutter StatefulWidget for creating or editing a transaction record based on whether an existing transaction is passed.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for the TransactionCrudScreen widget.

methods.name: _TransactionCrudScreenState
methods.description: State class managing form inputs, validation, submission, and deletion actions for the transaction CRUD screen.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the form fields with existing transaction data if editing.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Validates form data, creates a TransactionModel, and calls add or update methods in the provider, then navigates or sets an error.

methods.name: _delete
methods.description: Deletes the current transaction via provider and navigates or sets an error on failure.
